segments.text: I see the three figures in this line drawing kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Adult woman by the sink, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is filling and spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug, drain clogged maybe, puddle growing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled on the counter to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets open on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar full, boy's hand inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool unstable, splayed legs tipping back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing, reaching toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window view of path, bushes, fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
